title: bcd-watch: BCD changes (weekly)
description: A feed that summarizes changes to BCD weekly

items.content_html:
BCD Changes Report, Fri Jun 07 2024

Summary of BCD changes
from Tue May 28 2024 12:28:46 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)
to Fri Jun 07 2024 19:05:08 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)
